pages.text: The many difficult bosses of Reincarnation!

pages.name: The Lich
pages.text: Found occupying towers in the frozen lands, you'll need four Soul Stars to summon them, and one to find them. 25% chance of dropping a unique simply swords weapon on defeat.

pages.name: Void Blossom
pages.text: You'll find these deep beneath the earth. 50% chance of dropping a unique simply swords weapon on defeat.

pages.name: Obsidilith
pages.text: Found atop massive floating pillars in the end, bring a pickaxe and an eye of ender! 50% chance of dropping a unique simply swords weapon on defeat.

pages.name: The Gauntlet
pages.text: Found in the nether, break the blocks at the center to begin! 50% chance of dropping a unique simply swords weapon on defeat.

pages.name: Ender Dragon
pages.text: Beefed up and ready to fight! 50% chance of dropping a unique simply swords weapon on defeat.

pages.name: Graveyard Lich
pages.text: Found on top of massive floating islands in the overworld, he will need to be assembled. Good luck! 100% chance of dropping a unique simply swords weapon on defeat.

pages.name: Egg?
pages.text: Deep beneath the earth slumbers an ancient evil...
Ultris Boss Expansion! These have no additional unique drops add by the pack.
